name: Random Images, Videos and Audio
description:
This packs automation scripts and / or integrations that can pull random photos, videos or audio.

There is nothing special about this pack. It was designed to lighten up dashboards and incident layouts if so desired.

More and more scripts and automations will be added over time.

Simply add the automation script to a dynamic-section in an incident layout, or into a script based widget in a dashboard.
author: Adam Burt
